Instance.description: The Sim creates a carried object as part of a crafting process.

TunableVariant.name: carry_track_override
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify which hand the Sim must use to carry the created object.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: Which hand to carry the object in.

Tunable.name: posture_type
Tunable.description: Posture to use to carry the object.
